This Organisation Wants You

Better Stream

Social Streaming Provider

We need:

  • Office Intern

Mission Statement:

Better Stream is a platform for sustainable streaming. We source free documentaries, podcasts, films and series from public databases and offer a curate streaming experience. For our Berlin office we are looking for an office intern that helps us in our daily workload. We offer: Free lunch, free coffee and glimpse into a brand new start-up.

Yolanda is here to help you get engaged. Here you can learn more about me.
